title: auto update option for client
body: It would be nice if the client had an auto update option, so when you woke up the game was already updated because you have that option selected in client.

replies.body: you can set it up through your computer to just run the program at say midnight every night so if an update drops it'll download it then
you need to hit buttons for it to update
you need to hit buttons for the client to start an update? and even if you do that's just another program you'd have to set up
even if you can do it like that i would like it streamline
